hero.title:
Welcome to
PT. Sinergi Cahaya Utama Indah
hero.description: Social Entrepreneurship to inspire cross-sector collaboration to create positive social impact and prosperity for future generations.

getStarted.title: Company Philosophy - Synergy of Profitability and Humanity
getStarted.description1: PT SCUI holds the philosophy that the management of productive waqf funds must be directed to create sustainable economic growth, while maintaining the core value of trust that must not be diminished.
getStarted.description2: In the journey towards becoming a social enterprise-based venture capital company, SCUI invests strategically in businesses that not only promise financial returns, but also bring positive social impact to Indonesian society.

consultation.title: Get Consultation
consultation.subtitle: Contact us to learn more about available services and cooperation opportunities.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional services we provide to support the productive waqf ecosystem and community empowerment

wakaf.title: Productive Waqf Management
wakaf.description: Professionally managing waqf funds to increase asset value sustainably without reducing the principal waqf funds.

pemberdayaan.title: Community Empowerment
pemberdayaan.description: Empowerment programs such as UMKM carts, clean water well drilling, and solar panel installations for communities.

kemitraan.title: Strategic Partnerships
kemitraan.description: Building partnerships with state-owned enterprises and private companies for infrastructure and development projects.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Three main business units of PT SCUI in managing productive waqf funds

investment.title: INVESTMENT
investment.description: PT SCUI's investment business unit focuses on managing productive waqf funds with the aim of increasing asset value sustainably without reducing the principal waqf funds. Current largest investment: PT Kembar Jaya Abadi for Mechanical Electrical work at state-owned enterprise PT Kereta Api Properti Manajemen (KAPM).

services.title: SERVICES
services.description: PT SCUI's Services business unit provides various professional services that support the needs of the Lembaga Wakaf Nurul Taqwa (LWNT) and ZIS Indosat ecosystem and supports the operational activities of other productive businesses. SCUI works on several Zakat, Infaq, and Sedaqah fund distribution projects from ZIS Indosat for community empowerment.

trading.title: TRADING
trading.description: Trading of strategic goods and commodities to support economic growth and community empowerment in Indonesia.

features.title: Company Highlights
features.subtitle: Four main focuses that make PT SCUI a leading social enterprise in productive waqf management

projects.title: Latest Projects
projects.subtitle: Portfolio of investment, service, and trading projects of PT SCUI in managing productive waqf funds

clients.title: Clients & Business Partners
clients.subtitle: PT SCUI is proud to work with various clients and strategic partners in developing a sustainable business ecosystem

ecosystem.title: Partnership Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: PT SCUI is an integral part of the social-economic ecosystem in the Indosat environment that operates with sustainability and empowerment principles

blog.title: Latest News & Articles
blog.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest developments in SCUI projects and activities in managing productive waqf funds
